Values.11: Aging has been solved by their natural sciences
Values.12: Alien prisoners are held in a government facility
Values.14: All life on Earth constitutes a supercomputer
Values.15: All of history has been a reality TV show
Values.16: Anti-war Milky Way Commune hates us
Values.21: CYCLOPS denies knowledge of their existence
Values.22: CYCLOPS goes loud and public to ward them off
Values.23: CYCLOPS welcomes them for unknown reasons
Values.24: Different aliens are after them (p. 107 again)
Values.31: Earth is a Systems Collective wildlife refuge
Values.32: Earth is to be demolished (3-in-1D6: Clerical error)
Values.34: Earth will be a colony for the United Star Empire
Values.35: Everyone in the galaxy wants the H-bomb
Values.36: Famous human was one of them
Values.41: FTL travel is quite simple (2-in-1D6: This is a scam)
Values.42: No other world has drugs so potent
Values.43: Not happy about what we did to Lt. Cmdr. Jesus
Values.44: One Earth government declares war against them
Values.46: Our solar system is their Shangri-La
Values.52: Our technology is the most advanced anywhere
Values.53: Simulations indicate our society will collapse soon
Values.54: Someone here is the Galactic Chosen One
Values.55: The asteroid belt holds invaluable minerals
Values.56: They bet credits on our wars (3-in-1D6: They lost)
Values.61: They find us delicious (5-in-1D6: Won't admit it)
Values.62: They have taken our fiction as fact
Values.63: They're here to pick up true believers
Values.65: We've been blacklisted by the Galactic Alliance
